title: True Ambition Trial
body:
True Ambition is an international gaming organisation with different teams like csgo, cod,Halo, etc. We are holding a strong roster atm and is need to complete it with talent. OCS Is coming up so we need to practice hard in the holidays.
Comment below if interested 
IGN:
RANK:
ROLE:
Champion pool
Any previous team: yes/no, if so what team
Check us out on Twitter 
TRIAL IS HELD 
DATE: 21/12/2015
Time: 9 pm AEST
